Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The remaining 73 patients ( 55 women and 18 men ) , all of whom were examined for more than 3 months , were adopted as the subjects of the investigation .

Let's think step by step.

There are no disease entities mentioned in the given paragraph. The paragraph only mentions a group of patients who were examined for more than 3 months and were adopted as the subjects of an investigation. It does not mention any specific diseases or health conditions. Therefore, there are no disease entities in this paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Sure, here's the revised paragraph with the irrelevant entities removed:

"The remaining 73 patients (55 women and 18 men), all of whom were examined for more than 3 months, were adopted as the subjects of the investigation."

In this revised paragraph, the only entity that refers to a disease is "patients," which implies that the individuals in question have some kind of health condition or illness. Therefore, the disease entity in this paragraph is "patients."

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid entity in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table with one column "Disease":

| Disease |
| --- |
| patients |

The entity "patients" refers to individuals who have a health condition or illness, and is the only disease-related entity mentioned in the paragraph.
